property.name: Flavor
property.value: As long as the stronghold controlled the sky, the rebels were doomed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an opponent controls a Forest and you control an Island, you may cast Submerge without paying its mana cost. Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fading 4 (This artifact enters the battlefield with four fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.) At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player taps an untapped artifact, creature, or land he or she controls for each fade counter on Tangle Wire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ċ: Add 1 to your mana pool. 2, Ċ: You may put a basic land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature with the greatest power. (If two or more creatures are tied for greatest power, target any one of them.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let all witness the fate of those who defy me."—Crovax

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gravity is truly what you make of it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ą, Ċ, Discard a card: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If it ain't broke, I'll break it. If it is broke, I'll fix it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vicious Hunger deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Blood is foul, the flesh dross. My ascendance thirsts for life itself."—Crovax

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, Viseling deals X damage to that player, where X is the number of cards in his or her hand minus 4.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Above them all is Truth, and Truth must be set free. If the wings of Truth are clipped, the voices will fall silent."—Song of All, canto 167

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1Ć, Discard a creature card: Volrath the Fallen gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the discarded card's converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I stepped out. I did not step down."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Players play with their hands revealed.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The evincar has many ways of keeping track of his subjects.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if a player controls more creatures than each other player, the player who controls the most creatures gains control of Wild Mammoth.

property.value: Fading 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. If you can't, sacrifice it.) 1, Remove a fade counter from Woodripper: Destroy target artifact.
